abstract: Microsoft may be struggling to buy Yahoo, but the giant software maker’s current business is humming along smoothly.
snippet: Microsoft may be struggling to buy Yahoo, but the giant software maker’s current business is humming along smoothly.
lead_paragraph: Microsoft may be struggling to buy Yahoo, but the giant software maker’s current business is humming along smoothly.

headline.main: Profit Declines, but Microsoft Tops Forecast
headline.print_headline: Profit Declines, but Microsoft Tops Forecast

abstract: C’mon Steve. Now you’re going to have to pay up for Yahoo.
lead_paragraph: C’mon Steve. Now you’re going to have to pay up for Yahoo.

headline.main: Commentary: What Microsoft Must Do Next

abstract: Microsoft said that if Yahoo doesn’t submit to its merger proposal by Saturday, it will do something really bad next week. That might be going to Yahoo shareholders, abandoning the offer, or even buying AOL or some other Yahoo rival.
snippet: Microsoft said that if Yahoo doesn’t submit to its merger proposal by Saturday, it will do something really bad next week. That might be going to Yahoo shareholders, abandoning the offer, or even buying AOL or some other Yahoo rival.
lead_paragraph: Microsoft made one thing clear on its conference call with investors Thursday afternoon: We tech bloggers don’t have to work this weekend.

headline.main: Microsoft’s New Threat to Yahoo: We’ll Buy Someone Else
